import React from "react"; const Rating = ({ rating, numReviews }) => { return (
= 1 ? "fa fa-star" : rating >= 0.5 ? "fa fa-star-half-o" : "fa fa-star-o" } > =2 ? "fa fa-star" : rating >= 1.5 ? "fa fa-star-half-o" : "fa fa-star-o" } > = 3 ? "fa fa-star" : rating >= 2.5 ? "fa fa-star-half-o" : "fa fa-star-o" } > = 4 ? "fa fa-star" : rating >= 3.5 ? "fa fa-star-half-o" : "fa fa-star-o" } > = 6 ? "fa fa-star" : rating >= 5.5 ? "fa fa-star-half-o" : "fa fa-star-o" } > {numReviews + 'reviews'}
); }; export default Rating;
